title: "Attempting Simulation"
format: pdf
editor: visual
---

```{r}
world_elite <- df_women_c %>%
  filter(competition_scope == "World")%>%
  filter(Round != "TeamFinal")%>%
  filter(Round != "TeamQual")%>%
  filter(Rank <= 15)%>%
  distinct(clean_name, clean_country)


```

```{r}
other_elites <- df_women_c %>%
  filter(competition_scope != "World")%>%
  filter(Round != "TeamFinal")%>%
  filter(Round != "TeamQual")%>%
  filter(Rank <= 5)%>%
  distinct(clean_name, clean_country)

all_elites <- merge(world_elite, other_elites, by = "clean_name", all.x = T, all.y = T) 
```

```{r}
all_elites <- full_join(world_elite, other_elites, by = "clean_name") %>%
  select(c("clean_name", "clean_country.x"))%>%
  rename(clean_country = clean_country.x)
all_elites_1 <- full_join(world_elite, other_elites, by = c("clean_name", "clean_country"))

all_elites_1 %>%
  group_by(clean_name)%>%
  count()%>%
  filter(n !=1)
```

```{r}
anti_join(all_elites_1, all_elites)
```
